description: This file initializes and renders the main React application component into the DOM. It sets up the root element and wraps the App component within React's StrictMode for highlighting potential problems.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root rendering context for React application, enabling concurrent features in React 18+.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the DOM node associated with the root.
